channel.title: Comments on: LessThanDot Outage – Aug 22, 2013 to Sept 4, 2013
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: philhege
item.dc:creator: philhege
item.content:encoded:
Welcome back, Kot-terre! Looks like I’ll have to visit Twitter to get updates like this. The Google returned bupkes about the outage.

Blog on!

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: YAY! I didn't realize what a big part of my daily routine LTD was. Good to have us back!
item.content:encoded: YAY! I didn’t realize what a big part of my daily routine LTD was. Good to have us back!

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: looks like the Grumpkins and Snarks decided to no longer hold the server hostage
item.content:encoded: looks like the Grumpkins and Snarks decided to no longer hold the server hostage

item.title: By: remou

item.description: I am not sure I could have taken cold turkey much longer :)
